passives.short_desc: Mighty Touch of Death: Increases BRV damage dealt with Touch of Death

passives.short_desc: Charged Touch of Death: Raises use count of Touch of Death

passives.desc: Slightly raises Break Bonus upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Break Bonus Up: Raises Break Bonus

passives.name: Charged Snap Punch
passives.desc: Snap Punch use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Snap Punch: Raises use count of Snap Punch

passives.name: Greased Lightning
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK and SPD for 4 turns upon start of each wave
passives.short_desc: Greased Lightning: Raises ATK & SPD

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Snap Punch Extension
passives.desc:
With active buffs:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; becomes Critical when attacking enemy not targeting self; higher turn rate)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on own ATK; melee  PG attack +  PF attack; becomes Critical when attacking enemy not targeting self; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; higher turn rate)

When using Snap Punch:
 â€¢ Tremendous BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Moderate ATK Upã€? SPD Up boost
 â€¢ Becomes Critical when attacking enemy not targeting self
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 â€¢ Self: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II

After using BRV Attack+ or HP Attack+:
 â€¢ Snap Punch becomes Snap Punch+ (tremendous BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; returns to Snap Punch after use)
passives.short_desc: Snap Punch Extension: Boost to Snap Punch

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRVã€? ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Touch of Death Extension
passives.desc:
When using Touch of Death:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Moderate Poison boost
 â€¢ Target: 6 turns Sap
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use
 â€¢ Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
passives.short_desc: Touch of Death Extension: Boost to Touch of Death

passives.name: Tenacity Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRVã€? ATK
passives.short_desc: Tenacity Brilliance: Raises INT BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Attack Up Extension
passives.desc: When using Attack Up:\n â€¢ Adds effect that slightly raises own MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Attack Up Extension: Boost to Attack Up

passive.name: Attack Up Growth
passive.desc: Attack Up use +1\n\nAttack Up effect duration +1
passive.short_desc: Attack Up Growth: Boost to Attack Up

passive.name: Swift Punch
passive.desc: When using Snap Punchã€? Snap Punch+:\n â€¢ BRV damage boost\n â€¢ ATK Upã€? SPD Up duration+
passive.short_desc: Swift Punch: Boost to Snap Punch

passive.name: Great Passion
passive.desc:
When using Touch of Death:
 â€¢ BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Poison hit rate+ã€? duration+
 â€¢ Extends buffs by 1 turn once
 â€¢ Turn rate+
passive.short_desc: Great Passion: Boost to Touch of Death

passive.desc: May equip EX ability Tornado Kick\nAdds special effect Greased Lightning while Tornado Kick equipped
passive.short_desc: The Legend Continues: May equip Tornado Kick

passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Tornado Kickã€? Tornado Kick+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Tornado Kick: Increases BRV damage dealt with Tornado Kickã€? Tornado Kick+

passives.name: The Legend Continues Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Sudarshana Chakras (XIV) or passive ability The Legend Continues:\n â€¢ Slightly increased MAX BRVã€? ATK
